r.d: This is a DataSource driver for Structures_DataGrid using CSV files.
r.n: - Bug #8271: fixed a possible PHP error message in bind() that could occur for CSV strings longer than 255 characters (thanks to Gregor Gramlich, gramlich at eosc dot de) - Request #8272: added code for the case that a CSV file has actually more columns than the contents of the first row indicates (thanks to Gregor Gramlich, gramlich at eosc dot de)
